events.message: I recently ordered a jacket from your store, but it doesn't fit and I'd like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's request relates to a refund due to sizing issues, categorizing this case under Refund.
Assigning this refund request to the returns specialist team for further assistance.
Hello! Thanks for reaching out. I'm here to help you with your refund request for the jacket.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been worn or damaged?
My order number is 874239. I tried the jacket only once and it is in perfect condition, just the wrong size.
We will initiate your refund once the jacket is returned. I will send you a prepaid shipping label shortly.
Thank you for your quick response and the prepaid label. I appreciate the smooth support process.
We have processed your refund successfully after receiving the returned jacket. The amount should reflect in your account shortly.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
We are closing this case now. Please contact us anytime if you need further assistance. Have a great day!
We have sent you a satisfaction survey to gather your feedback on how we handled your refund request.
